trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tiril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiril can use her Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiril's choice that is within 120 feet of Tiril and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiril's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Tiril exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 ({@damage 11d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiril beats her wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Tiril must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiril can then fly up to half her flying speed.
